text: Neha Marda is an Indian television actress. She is well known for her roles in Balika Vadhu, Doli Armaano Ki and Kyun Rishton Mein Katti Batti. In 2015, she participated in Jhalak Dikhhla Jaa. == References == == Other websites == * * Category:Indian television actors Category:Living people
title: Neha Marda
